Privacy Policy for Sales And Persuasion GPT

Effective Date: August 17, 2025
Last Updated: August 17, 2025

1. Introduction

This Privacy Policy describes how the "Sales And Persuasion" Custom GPT ("we," "us," or "our") collects, uses, and protects information when you interact with our service.

2. Information We Collect

2.1 Information You Provide

  • Messages and prompts you send to the GPT

2.2 Automatically Collected Information

  • Session data and timestamps

3. How We Use Your Information

We use the information collected to:

  • Provide personalized sales and persuasion advice

  • Analyze usage patterns to enhance the service
  • Generate sales strategies and recommendations

4. Data Sharing and Disclosure

We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties, except:

5. Data Storage and Security

  • Conversations are processed through OpenAI's systems
  • We implement appropriate security measures to protect your data
  • Data retention follows OpenAI's standard policies
  • No long-term storage of personal conversation data

6. Your Rights and Choices

You have the right to:

  • Access your data
  • Request data deletion
  • Opt out of data collection
  • Modify your privacy preferences

7. Third-Party Services

8. Children's Privacy

This service is not intended for users under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

9. International Users

This service may be used globally. By using our GPT, you consent to the transfer and processing of your information in accordance with this policy.

10. Changes to This Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. Users will be notified of any material changes through the GPT interface or other appropriate means.
